content: तामस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [तमोऽस्त्यस्य अण्] {@--1@} Dark, consisting of darkness; <ls>Māl. 9. 52</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Affected by or relating to तमस् or the quality of darkness (the third of the three qualities of nature); <ls>Bg. 7. 12</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">17. 2</ls>; <ls>M. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 33-34.</ls> {@--3@} Ignorant. {@--4@} Vicious. --सः {@--1@} A malignant person, an incendiary, a villain. {@--2@} A snake. {@--3@} An owl. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a son of Rāhu. --सं Darkness. --सी {@--1@} Night, a dark night. {@--2@} Sleep. {@--3@} An epithet of Durgā.
